climbs.name: Shaky Legs
climbs.fa: Mike Clark and Bruce Hildenbrand February 1978

content.description: This route starts off the top of Amphitheater Lieback.  Climb up past one bolt to a small right facing corner.  Lieback the corner to a second bolt then mantle up and left(crux) and then up and left past four more bolts to join Friday the 13th just before the top of that route's first pitch.  Follow Friday the 13th to the top of the wall.
content.protection: Take gear up to a 2" cam for Amphitheater Lieback and Friday the 13th.
content.location: This route begins at the two bolt anchor on top of Amphitheater Lieback.

content.description: Follow the ramps up to the obvious right facing corner that has an awesome sharp edge for liebacking. The climb is mostly 3rd class up to the corner which is maybe 25ft long. Good pumpy fun
content.protection: Guide book says pro to 1.5", I didnt place anything bigger than a .75 and not many pieces either due to how short the route is. Bolted anchor on top, 70m reaches and can top rope if you want
content.location: It's the first route you see when reaching the base and the prominent feature of the wall. Cant miss it
